summary.span: 定義及代表可以編譯、執行和捨棄的動態方法。

span.span: Defines and represents a dynamic method that can be compiled, executed, and discarded.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用類別來產生，並在執行階段，執行方法，而不需產生動態組件和動態的型別包含方法。You can use the class to generate and execute a method at run time, without having to generate a dynamic assembly and a dynamic type to contain the method. 在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器所建立的可執行程式碼會回收時收回物件。The executable code created by the just-in-time (JIT) compiler is reclaimed when the object is reclaimed. 動態方法是最有效率的方式來產生並執行程式碼的資訊量很少。Dynamic methods are the most efficient way to generate and execute small amounts of code. 可以匿名裝載動態方法，或可以是邏輯上相關聯的模組或型別。A dynamic method can be anonymously hosted, or it can be logically associated with a module or with a type. - 如果匿名裝載動態方法，它是系統提供的組件，位於，因此與其他程式碼分開。If the dynamic method is anonymously hosted, it is located in a system-provided assembly, and therefore is isolated from other code. 根據預設，它沒有任何非公用資料的存取權。By default, it does not have access to any non-public data. 匿名裝載的動態方法可以限制略過 JIT 編譯器可見度檢查，如果被授與能力與旗標。An anonymously hosted dynamic method can have restricted ability to skip the JIT compiler's visibility checks, if it has been granted with the flag. 動態方法所存取其非公用成員的組件的信任層級必須相同或發出動態方法的呼叫堆疊的信任層級的子集。The trust level of the assembly whose non-public members are accessed by the dynamic method must be equal to, or a subset of, the trust level of the call stack that emitted the dynamic method. 如需匿名裝載動態方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 在部分信任案例中發出的程式碼](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/walkthrough-emitting-code-in-partial-trust-scenarios.md)。For more information about anonymously hosted dynamic methods, see [Walkthrough: Emitting Code in Partial Trust Scenarios](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/walkthrough-emitting-code-in-partial-trust-scenarios.md). - 如果您指定的模組相關聯的動態方法，動態方法在有效的全域模組。If the dynamic method is associated with a module that you specify, the dynamic method is effectively global to that module. 它可以存取模組中的所有類型和所有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) 的類型的成員。It can access all types in the module and all `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) members of the types. 您可以將動態方法與任何模組，不論您建立模組，但前提是要求與旗標都可藉由呼叫堆疊，其中包含您的程式碼。You can associate a dynamic method with any module, regardless of whether you created the module, provided that a demand for with the flag can be satisfied by the call stack that includes your code. 如果旗標包含授權、 動態方法可以略過 JIT 編譯器可見度檢查，並且存取所有類型宣告為任何組件中的任何其他模組或模組中的私用資料。If the flag is included in the grant, the dynamic method can skip the JIT compiler's visibility checks and access the private data of all types declared in the module or in any other module in any assembly. > [!NOTE] > 當您指定動態方法在相關聯的模組時，該模組不能用於匿名裝載的系統提供組件中。When you specify the module with which a dynamic method is associated, that module must not be in the system-provided assembly that is used for anonymous hosting. - 如果您指定的型別相關聯的動態方法，其型別的所有成員的存取權不論存取層級。If the dynamic method is associated with a type that you specify, it has access to all members of the type, regardless of access level. 此外，可以略過 JIT 可見度檢查。In addition, JIT visibility checks can be skipped. 這可讓在相同的模組或任何組件中的任何其他模組中宣告其他類型的私用資料的動態方法存取。This gives the dynamic method access to the private data of other types declared in the same module or in any other module in any assembly. 您可以將動態方法與任何類型，但您的程式碼必須被授與兼具和旗標。You can associate a dynamic method with any type, but your code must be granted with both the and flags. 下表顯示哪些類型和成員可以存取匿名裝載的動態方法，與 JIT 可見度檢查，取決於是否不與旗標會授與。The following table shows which types and members are accessible to an anonymously hosted dynamic method, with and without JIT visibility checks, depending on whether with the flag is granted. ||不使用 Without |包含 With | |-|-|-| |不需略過 JIT 可見度檢查Without skipping JIT visibility checks|任何組件中的公用類型的公用成員。Public members of public types in any assembly.|任何組件中的公用類型的公用成員。Public members of public types in any assembly.| |正在略過 JIT 可見度檢查，以限制Skipping JIT visibility checks, with restrictions|任何組件中的公用類型的公用成員。Public members of public types in any assembly.|只有在其信任層級會等於或小於發出動態方法的組件的信任層級的組件中的所有型別的所有成員。All members of all types, only in assemblies whose trust levels are equal to or less than the trust level of the assembly that emitted the dynamic method.| > [!NOTE] > 之前[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，發出程式碼所需與旗標。Prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], emitting code required with the flag. 此權限會包含預設在完全信任和 LocalIntranet 具名使用權限集合中，但是不在網際網路權限集合。This permission is included by default in the FullTrust and LocalIntranet named permission sets, but not in the Internet permission set. 因此，在舊版的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]程式庫可以使用具有網際網路權限，只有當屬性，也會執行如。Therefore, in earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] a library can be used with Internet permissions only if it has the attribute and also executes an for . 這類程式庫需要仔細的安全性檢閱，因為編碼錯誤可能會造成安全性漏洞。Such libraries require careful security review because coding errors could result in security holes. [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] 允許在部分信任案例中發出程式碼，而不需提出任何安全性要求，因為產生的程式碼本質上並非有權限的作業。The [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] allows code to be emitted in partial trust scenarios without issuing any security demands, because generating code is not inherently a privileged operation. 也就是產生的程式碼之權限不會比發出程式碼的組件還多。That is, the generated code has no more permissions than the assembly that emits it. 這可讓程式庫發出安全性透明的程式碼，並可免除 判斷提示的需要，這可簡化撰寫安全程式庫的工作。This allows libraries that emit code to be security transparent and removes the need to assert , which simplifies the task of writing a secure library. 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]或更新版本。To use this feature, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. 下表顯示哪些類型和成員都可以與模組或模組中的類型相關聯的動態方法存取。The following table shows which types and members are accessible to a dynamic method that is associated with a module or with a type in a module. ||模組相關聯Associated with module|與類型相關聯Associated with type| |-|-|-| |不需略過 JIT 可見度檢查Without skipping JIT visibility checks|模組中的公用、 內部和私用類型的公用和內部成員。Public and internal members of public, internal, and private types in the module.

任何組件中的公用類型的公用成員。Public members of public types in any assembly.|所有成員相關聯的類型。All members of the associated type. 模組中的所有其他類型的公用和內部成員。Public and internal members of all the other types in the module.

任何組件中的公用類型的公用成員。Public members of public types in any assembly.| |正在略過 JIT 可見度檢查Skipping JIT visibility checks|任何組件中的所有型別的所有成員。All members of all types in any assembly.|任何組件中的所有型別的所有成員。All members of all types in any assembly.| 與模組相關聯的動態方法會具有該模組的權限。A dynamic method that is associated with a module has the permissions of that module. 與類型相關聯的動態方法已包含該類型的模組的權限。A dynamic method that is associated with a type has the permissions of the module containing that type. 動態方法和它們的參數不需要加以命名，但您可以指定名稱，以協助偵錯。Dynamic methods and their parameters do not have to be named, but you can specify names to assist in debugging. 動態方法或其參數上不支援自訂屬性。Custom attributes are not supported on dynamic methods or their parameters. 動態方法雖然`static`方法 (`Shared`方法，在 Visual Basic 中的)，則放寬規則，委派繫結中導入的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]讓繫結至物件的動態方法，這樣它就像是執行個體方法時呼叫使用該委派執行個體。Although dynamic methods are `static` methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic), the relaxed rules for delegate binding introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] allow a dynamic method to be bound to an object, so that it acts like an instance method when called using that delegate instance. 提供範例示範這方法多載。An example that demonstrates this is provided for the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，動態方法並不支援的符號資訊、 本機變數名稱和行號對應。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], dynamic methods do not support symbol information, that is, local variable names and line-number mapping. 這項限制可能會在未來版本中移除。This limitation might be removed in a future version. 您可以使用簡化偵錯的產生的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，然後再切換至動態方法最後在部署期間，因為在開發期間呼叫是這兩種情況中的相同。You can use during development to simplify debugging the generated Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), and then switch to dynamic methods during final deployment, because the calls are the same in both cases. ## 驗證Verification 下列清單摘要說明的動態方法可以包含無法驗證程式碼的狀況。The following list summarizes the conditions under which dynamic methods can contain unverifiable code. (例如，動態方法，將無法驗證如果其屬性設定為`false`。)(For example, a dynamic method is unverifiable if its property is set to `false`.) - 安全性關鍵組件相關聯的動態方法也是安全性關鍵，而且可以略過驗證。A dynamic method that is associated with a security-critical assembly is also security-critical, and can skip verification. 例如，沒有安全性屬性當做桌面應用程式執行的組件視為為安全性關鍵的執行階段。For example, an assembly without security attributes that is run as a desktop application is treated as security-critical by the runtime. 如果您將動態方法與組件產生關聯，動態方法包含無法驗證程式碼。If you associate a dynamic method with the assembly, the dynamic method can contain unverifiable code. - 如果具有層級 1 透明度的組件相關聯的動態方法含有未經驗證的程式碼，在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器會插入安全性要求。If a dynamic method that contains unverifiable code is associated with an assembly that has level 1 transparency, the just-in-time (JIT) compiler injects a security demand. 只有當完全信任的程式碼執行動態方法，要求就會成功。The demand succeeds only if the dynamic method is executed by fully trusted code. 請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)。See [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md). - 如果具有層級 2 透明度 （例如 mscorlib.dll) 的組件相關聯的動態方法含有未經驗證的程式碼，它就會擲回例外狀況 （由 JIT 編譯器插入） 而不是進行安全性要求。If a dynamic method that contains unverifiable code is associated with an assembly that has level 2 transparency (such as mscorlib.dll), it throws an exception (injected by the JIT compiler) instead of making a security demand. 請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。See [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md). - 匿名裝載的動態方法包含無法驗證的程式碼一律會擲回例外狀況。An anonymously hosted dynamic method that contains unverifiable code always throws an exception. 它永遠不可以略過驗證，即使它是建立並執行完全信任的程式碼。It can never skip verification, even if it is created and executed by fully trusted code. 無法驗證程式碼，會擲回的例外狀況會叫用動態方法的方式而有所不同。The exception that is thrown for unverifiable code varies depending on the way the dynamic method is invoked. 如果您使用叫用動態方法所傳回的委派方法，就會擲回。If you invoke a dynamic method by using a delegate returned from the method, a is thrown. 如果您使用叫用動態方法方法，會擲回內部。If you invoke the dynamic method by using the method, a is thrown with an inner . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立動態方法採用兩個參數。The following code example creates a dynamic method that takes two parameters. 這個範例會發出列印至主控台時，第一個參數的簡單函式主體，此範例會使用做為方法的傳回值的第二個參數。The example emits a simple function body that prints the first parameter to the console, and the example uses the second parameter as the return value of the method. 此範例完成藉由建立委派的方法、 叫用使用不同的參數，委派和最後會叫用動態方法使用方法。The example completes the method by creating a delegate, invokes the delegate with different parameters, and finally invokes the dynamic method using the method. [!code-cpp[Reflection.DynamicMethod.All#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.All/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection.DynamicMethod.All#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.All/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection.DynamicMethod.All#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.All/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動態方法所建立的這個建構函式是匿名的組件，而不是現有的類型或模組相關聯。The dynamic method that is created by this constructor is associated with an anonymous assembly instead of an existing type or module. 匿名的組件存在只用來提供沙箱環境的動態方法，也就是，以將它們與其他程式碼隔離。The anonymous assembly exists only to provide a sandbox environment for dynamic methods, that is, to isolate them from other code. 這個環境可讓您更安全的動態方法發出及執行部分信任程式碼。This environment makes it safe for the dynamic method to be emitted and executed by partially trusted code. 這個建構函式指定在 just-in-time (JIT) 可見度檢查將會強制執行的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的動態方法。This constructor specifies that just-in-time (JIT) visibility checks will be enforced for the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) of the dynamic method. 也就是動態方法中的程式碼可以存取公用類別的公用方法。That is, the code in the dynamic method has access to public methods of public classes. 如果該方法嘗試存取類型或成員，會擲回例外狀況`private`， `protected`，或`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)。Exceptions are thrown if the method tries to access types or members that are `private`, `protected`, or `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic). 若要建立具有限制略過 JIT 可見度檢查能力的動態方法，使用建構函式。To create a dynamic method that has restricted ability to skip JIT visibility checks, use the constructor. 建構匿名裝載的動態方法時，發出的組件的呼叫堆疊會包含在內。When an anonymously hosted dynamic method is constructed, the call stack of the emitting assembly is included. 叫用方法時，發出的組件的權限可用而不是實際呼叫者的權限。When the method is invoked, the permissions of the emitting assembly are used instead of the permissions of the actual caller. 因此，無法執行動態方法，在發出，即使它是傳遞給方法以及具有較高的信任層級的組件所執行的組件的權限的較高層級。Thus, the dynamic method cannot execute at a higher level of privilege than that of the assembly that emitted it, even if it is passed to and executed by an assembly that has a higher trust level. 這個建構函式指定方法屬性和，和呼叫慣例。This constructor specifies the method attributes and , and the calling convention . > [!NOTE] > 中引進這個建構函式[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]或更新版本。This constructor was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動態方法所建立的這個建構函式是匿名的組件，而不是現有的類型或模組相關聯。The dynamic method that is created by this constructor is associated with an anonymous assembly instead of an existing type or module. 匿名的組件存在只用來提供沙箱環境的動態方法，也就是，以將它們與其他程式碼隔離。The anonymous assembly exists only to provide a sandbox environment for dynamic methods, that is, to isolate them from other code. 這個環境可讓您更安全的動態方法發出及執行部分信任程式碼。This environment makes it safe for the dynamic method to be emitted and executed by partially trusted code. 匿名裝載動態方法沒有任何類型或成員會自動存取`private`， `protected`，或`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)。Anonymously hosted dynamic methods do not have automatic access to any types or members that are `private`, `protected`, or `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic). 這是不同的動態方法與現有的類型或模組，相關聯的相關聯的範圍中具有隱藏成員的存取權。This is different from dynamic methods that are associated with an existing type or module, which have access to hidden members in their associated scope. 指定`true`如`restrictedSkipVisibility`動態方法是否存取類型或成員`private`， `protected`，或`internal`。Specify `true` for `restrictedSkipVisibility` if your dynamic method has to access types or members that are `private`, `protected`, or `internal`. 這會提供給這些成員的動態方法，限制存取。This gives the dynamic method restricted access to these members. 也就是符合下列條件時，才可以存取成員：That is, the members can be accessed only if the following conditions are met: - 目標成員屬於具有等於或小於發出動態方法的呼叫堆疊的信任層級的組件。The target members belong to an assembly that has a level of trust equal to or lower than the call stack that emits the dynamic method. - 發出動態方法的呼叫堆疊會授與與旗標。The call stack that emits the dynamic method is granted with the flag. 以完全信任執行的程式碼時，這是永遠為 true。This is always true when the code is executed with full trust. 部分信任的程式碼，它才為 true 主機明確授與權限。For partially trusted code, it is true only if the host explicitly grants the permission. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果未授與權限，安全性例外狀況時擲回稱為或叫用動態方法時，不這個建構函式呼叫時。If the permission has not been granted, a security exception is thrown when is called or when the dynamic method is invoked, not when this constructor is called. 發出動態方法不需要任何特殊權限。No special permissions are required to emit the dynamic method. 例如，動態方法用來建立`restrictedSkipVisibility`設`true`可以存取在呼叫堆疊上的任何組件的私用成員，如果呼叫堆疊授與限制的成員存取。For example, a dynamic method that is created with `restrictedSkipVisibility` set to `true` can access a private member of any assembly on the call stack if the call stack has been granted restricted member access. 如果呼叫堆疊上的部分信任程式碼會建立動態方法，它無法存取私用成員中的型別的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]組件，因為這類組件是完全受信任。If the dynamic method is created with partially trusted code on the call stack, it cannot access a private member of a type in a [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assembly, because such assemblies are fully trusted. 如果`restrictedSkipVisibility`是`false`，會強制執行的 JIT 可見度檢查。If `restrictedSkipVisibility` is `false`, JIT visibility checks are enforced. 動態方法中的程式碼可以存取公用類別的公用方法，而且如果它嘗試存取類型或成員，會擲回例外狀況`private`， `protected`，或`internal`。The code in the dynamic method has access to public methods of public classes, and exceptions are thrown if it tries to access types or members that are `private`, `protected`, or `internal`. 建構匿名裝載的動態方法時，發出的組件的呼叫堆疊會包含在內。When an anonymously hosted dynamic method is constructed, the call stack of the emitting assembly is included. 叫用方法時，會使用發出的呼叫堆疊的權限，而不是實際呼叫者的權限。When the method is invoked, the permissions of the emitting call stack are used instead of the permissions of the actual caller. 因此，無法執行動態方法，在發出，即使它是傳遞給方法以及具有較高的信任層級的組件所執行的組件的權限的較高層級。Thus, the dynamic method cannot execute at a higher level of privilege than that of the assembly that emitted it, even if it is passed to and executed by an assembly that has a higher trust level. 這個建構函式指定方法屬性和，和呼叫慣例。This constructor specifies the method attributes and , and the calling convention . > [!NOTE] > 中引進這個建構函式[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]或更新版本。This constructor was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式指定方法屬性和，呼叫慣例，並不會略過在 just-in-time (JIT) 可見度檢查。This constructor specifies method attributes and , calling convention , and does not skip just-in-time (JIT) visibility checks. 這個建構函式以建立動態方法可存取公用和`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) 包含在模組中的所有型別的成員`m`。The dynamic method created with this constructor has access to public and `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) members of all the types contained in module `m`. > [!NOTE] > 回溯相容性，這個建構函式要求與旗標，如果下列條件都為 true:`m`是模組之外呼叫模組，以及需求的與旗標失敗。For backward compatibility, this constructor demands with the flag if the following conditions are both true: `m` is a module other than the calling module, and the demand for with the flag has failed. 如果要求成功時，允許此作業。If the demand for succeeds, the operation is allowed. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員與旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立動態方法採用兩個參數。The following code example creates a dynamic method that takes two parameters. 這個範例會發出列印至主控台時，第一個參數的簡單函式主體，此範例會使用做為方法的傳回值的第二個參數。The example emits a simple function body that prints the first parameter to the console, and the example uses the second parameter as the return value of the method. 此範例完成藉由建立委派的方法、 叫用使用不同的參數，委派和最後會叫用動態方法使用方法。The example completes the method by creating a delegate, invokes the delegate with different parameters, and finally invokes the dynamic method using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立此動態方法沒有型別的所有成員的存取權`owner`，並為 public 和`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) 包含的模組中的所有其他類型的成員`owner`。The dynamic method created with this constructor has access to all members of the type `owner`, and to public and `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) members of all the other types in the module that contains `owner`. 這個建構函式指定方法屬性和，呼叫慣例，並不會略過在 just-in-time (JIT) 可見度檢查。This constructor specifies method attributes and , calling convention , and does not skip just-in-time (JIT) visibility checks. > [!NOTE] > 回溯相容性，這個建構函式要求與旗標，如果下列條件都為 true:`owner`以外呼叫模組，以及需求的模組中與旗標失敗。For backward compatibility, this constructor demands with the flag if the following conditions are both true: `owner` is in a module other than the calling module, and the demand for with the flag has failed. 如果要求成功時，允許此作業。If the demand for succeeds, the operation is allowed. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員與旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立邏輯上相關聯的類型。The following code example creates a that is logically associated with a type. 此關聯可讓它存取該類型的私用成員。This association gives it access to the private members of that type. 程式碼範例定義名為類別`Example`私用欄位，與類別名稱為`DerivedFromxample`衍生自第一個類別，名為委派類型`UseLikeStatic`傳回且具有參數的型別`Example`和，和名為委派類型`UseLikeInstance`傳回且具有一個參數的型別。The code example defines a class named `Example` with a private field, a class named `DerivedFromxample` that derives from the first class, a delegate type named `UseLikeStatic` that returns and has parameters of type `Example` and , and a delegate type named `UseLikeInstance` that returns and has one parameter of type . 範例程式碼接著會建立變更執行個體的私用欄位`Example`並傳回先前的值。The example code then creates a that changes the private field of an instance of `Example` and returns the previous value. > [!NOTE] > 一般情況下，變更類別的內部欄位不是良好的物件導向程式設計方式。In general, changing the internal fields of classes is not good object-oriented coding practice. 範例程式碼建立的執行個體`Example`，然後建立兩個委派。The example code creates an instance of `Example` and then creates two delegates. 第一個是類型的`UseLikeStatic`，具有相同的動態方法的參數。The first is of type `UseLikeStatic`, which has the same parameters as the dynamic method. 第二個是型別`UseLikeInstance`，缺少第一個參數 (型別`Example`)。The second is of type `UseLikeInstance`, which lacks the first parameter (of type `Example`). 這個委派會使用建立方法多載; 第二個參數，該方法多載是的執行個體`Example`，在此情況下建立的執行個體只，為繫結到新建立的委派。This delegate is created using the method overload; the second parameter of that method overload is an instance of `Example`, in this case the instance just created, which is bound to the newly created delegate. 動態方法時叫用委派時，處理程式碼的繫結的執行個體`Example`。Whenever that delegate is invoked, the dynamic method acts on the bound instance of `Example`. > [!NOTE] > 這是比較不嚴謹的規則的範例，委派繫結中導入的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，以及新的多載方法。This is an example of the relaxed rules for delegate binding introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], along with new overloads of the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. `UseLikeStatic`叫用委派，在執行個體中傳遞`Example`繫結至`UseLikeInstance`委派。The `UseLikeStatic` delegate is invoked, passing in the instance of `Example` that is bound to the `UseLikeInstance` delegate. 然後在`UseLikeInstance`叫用委派，使這兩個相同的執行個體的代理人`Example`。Then the `UseLikeInstance` delegate is invoked, so that both delegates act on the same instance of `Example`. 每次呼叫之後，會顯示內部欄位的值中的變更。The changes in the values of the internal field are displayed after each call. 最後，`UseLikeInstance`委派繫結的執行個體`DerivedFromxample`，和委派呼叫，會重複。Finally, a `UseLikeInstance` delegate is bound to an instance of `DerivedFromxample`, and the delegate calls are repeated. [!code-csharp[Reflection.DynamicMethod.ClosedOver#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.ClosedOver/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection.DynamicMethod.ClosedOver#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.ClosedOver/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式指定方法屬性和，和呼叫慣例。This constructor specifies method attributes and , and calling convention . 這個建構函式以建立動態方法可存取公用和`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) 所包含的模組中的所有型別的成員`m`。The dynamic method created with this constructor has access to public and `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) members of all the types in contained module `m`. 略過 JIT 編譯器的可見性檢查可讓動態方法存取的所有其他型別的 private 和 protected 成員。Skipping the JIT compiler's visibility checks allows the dynamic method to access private and protected members of all other types as well. 例如，撰寫程式碼來將物件序列化時，這十分有用。This is useful, for example, when writing code to serialize objects. > [!NOTE] > 回溯相容性，這個建構函式要求與旗標，如果下列條件都為 true:`m`是模組之外呼叫模組，以及需求的與旗標失敗。For backward compatibility, this constructor demands with the flag if the following conditions are both true: `m` is a module other than the calling module, and the demand for with the flag has failed. 如果要求成功時，允許此作業。If the demand for succeeds, the operation is allowed. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員與旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立此動態方法沒有型別的所有成員的存取權`owner`，並為 public 和`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) 包含的模組中的所有其他類型的成員`owner`。The dynamic method created with this constructor has access to all members of the type `owner`, and to public and `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) members of all the other types in the module that contains `owner`. 略過 JIT 編譯器的可見性檢查可讓動態方法存取的所有其他型別的 private 和 protected 成員。Skipping the JIT compiler's visibility checks allows the dynamic method to access private and protected members of all other types as well. 例如，撰寫程式碼來將物件序列化時，這十分有用。This is useful, for example, when writing code to serialize objects. 這個建構函式指定方法屬性和，和呼叫慣例。This constructor specifies method attributes and , and calling convention . > [!NOTE] > 回溯相容性，這個建構函式要求與旗標，如果下列條件都為 true:`owner`以外呼叫模組，以及需求的模組中與旗標失敗。For backward compatibility, this constructor demands with the flag if the following conditions are both true: `owner` is in a module other than the calling module, and the demand for with the flag has failed. 如果要求成功時，允許此作業。If the demand for succeeds, the operation is allowed. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員與旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

summary.span: 建立對模組而言全域的動態方法，並指定方法名稱、屬性、呼叫慣例、傳回類型、參數類型、模組，以及是否應該略過動態方法的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 所存取之類型和成員的 Just-In-Time (JIT) 可見度檢查。

span.span: Creates a dynamic method that is global to a module, specifying the method name, attributes, calling convention, return type, parameter types, module, and whether just-in-time (JIT) visibility checks should be skipped for types and members accessed by the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) of the dynamic method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式以建立動態方法可存取公用和`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) 的所有公用及內部類型包含在模組中的成員`m`。The dynamic method created with this constructor has access to public and `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) members of all the public and internal types contained in module `m`. 略過 JIT 編譯器的可見性檢查可讓動態方法存取的所有其他類型和所有其他組件中模組的 private 和 protected 成員。Skipping the JIT compiler's visibility checks allows the dynamic method to access private and protected members of all other types in the module and in all other assemblies as well. 例如，撰寫程式碼來將物件序列化時，這十分有用。This is useful, for example, when writing code to serialize objects. > [!NOTE] > 回溯相容性，這個建構函式要求與旗標，如果下列條件都為 true:`m`是模組之外呼叫模組，以及需求的與旗標失敗。For backward compatibility, this constructor demands with the flag if the following conditions are both true: `m` is a module other than the calling module, and the demand for with the flag has failed. 如果要求成功時，允許此作業。If the demand for succeeds, the operation is allowed. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員與旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動態方法在全域範圍中包含的類型的模組`owner`。The dynamic method is global to the module that contains the type `owner`. 存取類型的所有成員`owner`。It has access to all members of the type `owner`. 使用這個建構函式建立此動態方法沒有型別的所有成員的存取權`owner`，和為 public 和`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) 包含的模組中所包含的所有型別的成員`owner`。The dynamic method created with this constructor has access to all members of the type `owner`, and to public and `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) members of all the types contained in the module that contains `owner`. 略過 JIT 編譯器的可見性檢查可讓動態方法存取的所有其他型別的 private 和 protected 成員。Skipping the JIT compiler's visibility checks allows the dynamic method to access private and protected members of all other types as well. 例如，撰寫程式碼來將物件序列化時，這十分有用。This is useful, for example, when writing code to serialize objects. > [!NOTE] > 回溯相容性，這個建構函式要求與旗標，如果下列條件都為 true:`owner`以外呼叫模組，以及需求的模組中與旗標失敗。For backward compatibility, this constructor demands with the flag if the following conditions are both true: `owner` is in a module other than the calling module, and the demand for with the flag has failed. 如果要求成功時，允許此作業。If the demand for succeeds, the operation is allowed. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員與旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法或方法完成動態方法。Calling the method or the method completes the dynamic method. 任何進一步嘗試改變動態方法，例如修改參數定義或發出多個 Microsoft 中繼語言 (MSIL)，則會忽略;擲不回任何例外狀況。Any further attempt to alter the dynamic method, such as modifying parameter definitions or emitting more Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), is ignored; no exception is thrown. 若要建立動態方法之方法主體，當您有自己的 MSIL 產生器時，呼叫方法，以取得物件。To create a method body for a dynamic method when you have your own MSIL generator, call the method to obtain a object. 如果您沒有自己的 MSIL 產生器，呼叫方法，以取得可以用來產生方法主體的物件。If you do not have your own MSIL generator, call the method to obtain an object that can be used to generate the method body. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立動態方法採用兩個參數。The following code example creates a dynamic method that takes two parameters. 這個範例會發出列印至主控台時，第一個參數的簡單函式主體，此範例會使用做為方法的傳回值的第二個參數。The example emits a simple function body that prints the first parameter to the console, and the example uses the second parameter as the return value of the method. 此範例完成藉由建立委派的方法、 叫用使用不同的參數，委派和最後會叫用動態方法使用方法。The example completes the method by creating a delegate, invokes the delegate with different parameters, and finally invokes the dynamic method using the method. [!code-cpp[Reflection.DynamicMethod.ctor1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.ctor1/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection.DynamicMethod.ctor1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.ctor1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection.DynamicMethod.ctor1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.ctor1/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法多載建立委派繫結至特定的物件。This method overload creates a delegate bound to a particular object. 這類委派會在其第一個引數上關閉。Such a delegate is said to be closed over its first argument. 雖然這個方法是靜態的它可如同一般的執行個體方法。執行個體是`target`。Although the method is static, it acts as if it were an instance method; the instance is `target`. 這個方法多載都需要`target`是相同類型的第一個參數的動態方法，或要指派給該型別 （例如，在衍生類別）。This method overload requires `target` to be of the same type as the first parameter of the dynamic method, or to be assignable to that type (for example, a derived class). 簽章`delegateType`動態方法的第一個以外的所有參數。The signature of `delegateType` has all the parameters of the dynamic method except the first. 例如，如果此動態方法沒有參數， ，和，然後`delegateType`具有參數和;`target`的型別。For example, if the dynamic method has the parameters , , and , then `delegateType` has the parameters and ; `target` is of type . 呼叫方法或方法完成動態方法。Calling the method or the method completes the dynamic method. 任何進一步嘗試改變動態方法，例如修改參數定義或發出多個 Microsoft 中繼語言 (MSIL)，則會忽略;擲不回任何例外狀況。Any further attempt to alter the dynamic method, such as modifying parameter definitions or emitting more Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), is ignored; no exception is thrown. 若要建立動態方法之方法主體，當您有自己的 MSIL 產生器時，呼叫方法，以取得物件。To create a method body for a dynamic method when you have your own MSIL generator, call the method to obtain a object. 如果您沒有自己的 MSIL 產生器，呼叫方法，以取得可以用來產生方法主體的物件。If you do not have your own MSIL generator, call the method to obtain an object that can be used to generate the method body. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立繫結的委派型別的執行個體，使方法的運作將相同的執行個體上每次叫用它。The following code example creates delegate that binds a to an instance of a type, so that the method acts on the same instance each time it is invoked. 程式碼範例定義名為類別`Example`私用欄位，與類別名稱為`DerivedFromxample`衍生自第一個類別，名為委派類型`UseLikeStatic`傳回且具有參數的型別`Example`和，和名為委派類型`UseLikeInstance`傳回且具有一個參數的型別。The code example defines a class named `Example` with a private field, a class named `DerivedFromxample` that derives from the first class, a delegate type named `UseLikeStatic` that returns and has parameters of type `Example` and , and a delegate type named `UseLikeInstance` that returns and has one parameter of type . 範例程式碼接著會建立變更執行個體的私用欄位`Example`並傳回先前的值。The example code then creates a that changes the private field of an instance of `Example` and returns the previous value. > [!NOTE] > 一般情況下，變更類別的內部欄位不是良好的物件導向程式設計方式。In general, changing the internal fields of classes is not good object-oriented coding practice. 範例程式碼建立的執行個體`Example`，然後建立兩個委派。The example code creates an instance of `Example` and then creates two delegates. 第一個是類型的`UseLikeStatic`，具有相同的動態方法的參數。The first is of type `UseLikeStatic`, which has the same parameters as the dynamic method. 第二個是型別`UseLikeInstance`，缺少第一個參數 (型別`Example`)。The second is of type `UseLikeInstance`, which lacks the first parameter (of type `Example`). 這個委派會使用建立方法多載; 第二個參數，該方法多載是的執行個體`Example`，在此情況下建立的執行個體只，為繫結到新建立的委派。This delegate is created using the method overload; the second parameter of that method overload is an instance of `Example`, in this case the instance just created, which is bound to the newly created delegate. 動態方法時叫用委派時，處理程式碼的繫結的執行個體`Example`。Whenever that delegate is invoked, the dynamic method acts on the bound instance of `Example`. > [!NOTE] > 這是比較不嚴謹的規則的範例，委派繫結中導入的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，以及新的多載方法。This is an example of the relaxed rules for delegate binding introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], along with new overloads of the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. `UseLikeStatic`叫用委派，在執行個體中傳遞`Example`繫結至`UseLikeInstance`委派。The `UseLikeStatic` delegate is invoked, passing in the instance of `Example` that is bound to the `UseLikeInstance` delegate. 然後在`UseLikeInstance`叫用委派，使這兩個相同的執行個體的代理人`Example`。Then the `UseLikeInstance` delegate is invoked, so that both delegates act on the same instance of `Example`. 每次呼叫之後，會顯示內部欄位的值中的變更。The changes in the values of the internal field are displayed after each call. 最後，`UseLikeInstance`委派繫結的執行個體`DerivedFromxample`，和委派呼叫，會重複。Finally, a `UseLikeInstance` delegate is bound to an instance of `DerivedFromxample`, and the delegate calls are repeated. remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了列出的例外狀況，呼叫程式碼應該準備好攔截動態方法所擲回任何例外狀況。In addition to the listed exceptions, the calling code should be prepared to catch any exceptions thrown by the dynamic method. 執行動態方法所建立的委派方法會更有效率，比執行它與方法。Executing a dynamic method with a delegate created by the method is more efficient than executing it with the method. 呼叫方法或方法完成動態方法。Calling the method or the method completes the dynamic method. 任何進一步嘗試改變動態方法，例如修改參數定義或發出多個 Microsoft 中繼語言 (MSIL)，則會忽略;擲不回任何例外狀況。Any further attempt to alter the dynamic method, such as modifying parameter definitions or emitting more Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), is ignored; no exception is thrown. 所有的動態方法是靜態的所以`obj`參數會被忽略。All dynamic methods are static, so the `obj` parameter is always ignored. 若要將動態方法，就好像執行個體方法，使用接受物件執行個體的多載。To treat a dynamic method as if it were an instance method, use the overload that takes an object instance. 如果動態方法沒有參數，值`parameters`應該`null`。If the dynamic method has no parameters, the value of `parameters` should be `null`. 否則數字、 類型和參數陣列中項目的順序應該與數字、 類型和參數的動態方法的順序相同。Otherwise the number, type, and order of elements in the parameters array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters of the dynamic method. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法多載會呼叫方法多載繼承自類別中，因此上述的 < 備註 > 一套用於兩個多載。This method overload is called by the method overload inherited from the class, so the preceding remarks apply to both overloads. 這個方法不會直接要求權限，但叫用動態方法時，可能導致安全性要求，根據的方法。This method does not demand permissions directly, but invoking the dynamic method can result in security demands, depending on the method. 例如，會提出任何要求的匿名裝載動態方法，以建立`restrictedSkipVisibility`參數設定為`false`。For example, no demands are made for anonymously hosted dynamic methods that are created with the `restrictedSkipVisibility` parameter set to `false`. 另一方面，如果您建立的方法與`restrictedSkipVisibility`設`true`讓它可存取的目標組件的隱藏的成員，方法會導致目標組件加上的權限的要求與旗標。On the other hand, if you create a method with `restrictedSkipVisibility` set to `true` so it can access a hidden member of a target assembly, the method will cause a demand for the permissions of the target assembly plus with the flag. > [!NOTE] > 之前[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法所需與旗標。Prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method required with the flag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例中，會叫用動態方法與完全繫結，使用英文 （美國） 文化特性。The following code example invokes a dynamic method with exact binding, using the US-English culture. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Reflection.DynamicMethod.All#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.All/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Reflection.DynamicMethod.All#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.All/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Reflection.DynamicMethod.All#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection.DynamicMethod.All/VB/source.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動態方法，指定`true`如`inherit`沒有任何作用。For dynamic methods, specifying `true` for `inherit` has no effect. 動態方法可以有任何的繼承鏈結。Dynamic methods have no inheritance chain. > [!NOTE] > 自訂屬性目前不支援動態方法上。Custom attributes are not currently supported on dynamic methods.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示目前動態方法是否為安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵，因而可以執行重要的作業。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current dynamic method is security-critical or security-safe-critical, and therefore can perform critical operations.

span.span: if the current dynamic method is security-critical or security-safe-critical; if it is transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性報告 common language runtime (CLR) 所決定的動態方法的透明度。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the dynamic method as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 這些屬性的組合是下表所示：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全性層級Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecuritySafeCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |CriticalCritical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |安全關鍵Safe critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件及其類型的安全性註釋、檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. 動態方法的透明度，取決於其相關聯的模組。The transparency of a dynamic method depends on the module it is associated with. 如果動態方法的型別，而不是模組與相關聯，其透明度相依於此模組包含的型別。If the dynamic method is associated with a type rather than a module, its transparency depends on the module that contains the type. 動態方法沒有安全性註釋，因此就會指派預設的透明度相關聯的模組。Dynamic methods do not have security annotations, so they are assigned the default transparency for the associated module. - 匿名裝載動態方法永遠是透明的因為它們包含的系統提供模組而言是透明。Anonymously hosted dynamic methods are always transparent, because the system-provided module that contains them is transparent. - 下表描述與受信任的組件 （也就是強式名稱組件安裝在全域組件快取） 相關聯的動態方法的透明度。The transparency of a dynamic method that is associated with a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is described in the following table. |組件註解Assembly annotation|層級 1 透明度Level 1 transparency|層級 2 透明度Level 2 transparency| |-------------------------|--------------------------|--------------------------| |完全透明Fully transparent|透明Transparent|透明Transparent| |完全重大Fully critical|CriticalCritical|CriticalCritical| |混合的透明度Mixed transparency|透明Transparent|透明Transparent| |無從驗證的安全性Security-agnostic|安全關鍵Safe-critical|CriticalCritical| 例如，如果您將動態方法關聯 mscorlib.dll 中，有層級 2 混合的透明度，其中的型別動態方法是透明的並無法執行重要的程式碼。For example, if you associate a dynamic method with a type that is in mscorlib.dll, which has level 2 mixed transparency, the dynamic method is transparent and cannot execute critical code. 透明度層級的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)和[安全性透明程式碼，層級 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For information about transparency levels, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md) and [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md). > [!NOTE] > 動態方法關聯中與安全性無關，（例如 system.dll），是信任層級 1 組件的模組不允許提高權限的信任。Associating a dynamic method with a module in a trusted level 1 assembly that is security-agnostic, such as System.dll, does not permit elevation of trust. 如果呼叫的動態方法的程式碼的授權集不包含 System.dll （也就是完全信任） 的授權集動態方法呼叫時擲回。If the grant set of the code that calls the dynamic method does not include the grant set of System.dll (that is, full trust), is thrown when the dynamic method is called. - 載入組件的方式取決於部分信任組件相關聯的動態方法的透明度。The transparency of a dynamic method that is associated with a partially trusted assembly depends on how the assembly is loaded. 如果組件已載入以部分信任 （例如，插入的沙箱化應用程式定義域），執行階段就會忽略組件的安全性註釋。If the assembly is loaded with partial trust (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly. 組件和所有類型和成員，包括動態方法，會都視為透明的。The assembly and all its types and members, including dynamic methods, are treated as transparent. 只有部分信任組件是以完全信任 （例如，插入的桌面應用程式的預設應用程式網域） 來載入執行階段會付款注意安全性註釋。The runtime pays attention to security annotations only if the partial-trust assembly is loaded with full trust (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application). 在此情況下，執行階段指派的動態方法預設透明度根據組件的註解的方法。In that case, the runtime assigns the dynamic method the default transparency for methods according to the assembly's annotations. 如需有關反映發出和透明度，請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。For more information about reflection emit and transparency, see [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md). 透明度的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

匿名裝載動態方法永遠是透明的因為它們包含的系統提供模組而言是透明。Anonymously hosted dynamic methods are always transparent, because the system-provided module that contains them is transparent. - 下表描述與受信任的組件 （也就是強式名稱組件安裝在全域組件快取） 相關聯的動態方法的透明度。The transparency of a dynamic method that is associated with a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is described in the following table. |組件註解Assembly annotation|層級 1 透明度Level 1 transparency|層級 2 透明度Level 2 transparency| |-------------------------|--------------------------|--------------------------| |完全透明Fully transparent|透明Transparent|透明Transparent| |完全重大Fully critical|CriticalCritical|CriticalCritical| |混合的透明度Mixed transparency|透明Transparent|透明Transparent| |無從驗證的安全性Security-agnostic|安全關鍵Safe-critical|CriticalCritical| 例如，如果您將動態方法關聯 mscorlib.dll 中，有層級 2 混合的透明度，其中的型別動態方法是透明的並無法執行重要的程式碼。For example, if you associate a dynamic method with a type that is in mscorlib.dll, which has level 2 mixed transparency, the dynamic method is transparent and cannot execute critical code. 透明度層級的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)和[安全性透明程式碼，層級 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For information about transparency levels, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md) and [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md). > [!NOTE] > 動態方法關聯中與安全性無關，（例如 system.dll），是信任層級 1 組件的模組不允許提高權限的信任。Associating a dynamic method with a module in a trusted level 1 assembly that is security-agnostic, such as System.dll, does not permit elevation of trust. 如果呼叫的動態方法的程式碼的授權集不包含 System.dll （也就是完全信任） 的授權集動態方法呼叫時擲回。If the grant set of the code that calls the dynamic method does not include the grant set of System.dll (that is, full trust), is thrown when the dynamic method is called. - 載入組件的方式取決於部分信任組件相關聯的動態方法的透明度。The transparency of a dynamic method that is associated with a partially trusted assembly depends on how the assembly is loaded. 如果組件已載入以部分信任 （例如，插入的沙箱化應用程式定義域），執行階段就會忽略組件的安全性註釋。If the assembly is loaded with partial trust (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly. 組件和所有類型和成員，包括動態方法，會都視為透明的。The assembly and all its types and members, including dynamic methods, are treated as transparent. 只有部分信任組件是以完全信任 （例如，插入的桌面應用程式的預設應用程式網域） 來載入執行階段會付款注意安全性註釋。The runtime pays attention to security annotations only if the partial-trust assembly is loaded with full trust (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application). 在此情況下，執行階段指派的動態方法預設透明度根據組件的註解的方法。In that case, the runtime assigns the dynamic method the default transparency for methods according to the assembly's annotations. 如需有關反映發出和透明度，請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。For more information about reflection emit and transparency, see [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md). 透明度的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性報告 common language runtime (CLR) 所決定的動態方法的透明度。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the dynamic method as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 這些屬性的組合是下表所示：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全性層級Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecuritySafeCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |CriticalCritical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |安全關鍵Safe critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件及其類型的安全性註釋、檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. 動態方法的透明度，取決於其相關聯的模組。The transparency of a dynamic method depends on the module it is associated with. 如果動態方法的型別，而不是模組與相關聯，其透明度相依於此模組包含的型別。If the dynamic method is associated with a type rather than a module, its transparency depends on the module that contains the type. 動態方法沒有安全性註釋，因此就會指派預設的透明度相關聯的模組。Dynamic methods do not have security annotations, so they are assigned the default transparency for the associated module. - 匿名裝載動態方法永遠是透明的因為它們包含的系統提供模組而言是透明。Anonymously hosted dynamic methods are always transparent, because the system-provided module that contains them is transparent. - 下表描述與受信任的組件 （也就是強式名稱組件安裝在全域組件快取） 相關聯的動態方法的透明度。The transparency of a dynamic method that is associated with a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is described in the following table. |組件註解Assembly annotation|層級 1 透明度Level 1 transparency|層級 2 透明度Level 2 transparency| |-------------------------|--------------------------|--------------------------| |完全透明Fully transparent|透明Transparent|透明Transparent| |完全重大Fully critical|CriticalCritical|CriticalCritical| |混合的透明度Mixed transparency|透明Transparent|透明Transparent| |無從驗證的安全性Security-agnostic|安全關鍵Safe-critical|CriticalCritical| 例如，如果您將動態方法關聯 mscorlib.dll 中，有層級 2 混合的透明度，其中的型別動態方法是透明的並無法執行重要的程式碼。For example, if you associate a dynamic method with a type that is in mscorlib.dll, which has level 2 mixed transparency, the dynamic method is transparent and cannot execute critical code. 透明度層級的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)和[安全性透明程式碼，層級 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For information about transparency levels, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md) and [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md). > [!NOTE] > 動態方法關聯中與安全性無關，（例如 system.dll），是信任層級 1 組件的模組不允許提高權限的信任。Associating a dynamic method with a module in a trusted level 1 assembly that is security-agnostic, such as System.dll, does not permit elevation of trust. 如果呼叫的動態方法的程式碼的授權集不包含 System.dll （也就是完全信任） 的授權集動態方法呼叫時擲回。If the grant set of the code that calls the dynamic method does not include the grant set of System.dll (that is, full trust), is thrown when the dynamic method is called. - 載入組件的方式取決於部分信任組件相關聯的動態方法的透明度。The transparency of a dynamic method that is associated with a partially trusted assembly depends on how the assembly is loaded. 如果組件已載入以部分信任 （例如，插入的沙箱化應用程式定義域），執行階段就會忽略組件的安全性註釋。If the assembly is loaded with partial trust (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly. 組件和所有類型和成員，包括動態方法，會都視為透明的。The assembly and all its types and members, including dynamic methods, are treated as transparent. 只有部分信任組件是以完全信任 （例如，插入的桌面應用程式的預設應用程式網域） 來載入執行階段會付款注意安全性註釋。The runtime pays attention to security annotations only if the partial-trust assembly is loaded with full trust (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application). 在此情況下，執行階段指派的動態方法預設透明度根據組件的註解的方法。In that case, the runtime assigns the dynamic method the default transparency for methods according to the assembly's annotations. 如需有關反映發出和透明度，請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。For more information about reflection emit and transparency, see [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md). 透明度的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).
